name: Cooklet
tag_list: recipes, organiser, cookbooks, international, cross-screen, platform
overview:
Cooklet is an international culinary platform.

The idea behind it is to organise recipes in easy to use interactive cookbooks. It is a place of sharing experiences among authors and users from all over the world.

The webcentre is located at www.Cooklet.com and enriched with Adobe Flash technologies. Platform is complemented by a website for mobile devices Cooklet.mobi and two applications:

  • Cooklet App: desktop browser, based on Adobe AIR.
  • Cooklet Lite: mobile assistant, based on Adobe Flash Lite.

The whole system uses complex software solutions such as artificial intelligence, automatic translation and full synchronization between all elements of the platform.

Cooklet is in beta and is currently available in Polish, English and will soon be accessible in other languages.
